text: first place a whole gutted sea bass on
foil and seasoned the fish inside and
out sea bass is known as the king of the
Seas and has a wonderful sweet white
flesh start the stuffing with sliced
fennel its aniseed flavor works
brilliantly with the fish next add
capers fresh dill and slices of lemon
then dotting knobs of butter lastly add
a splash of white wine which helps to
steam the fish and create a lovely sauce
and seal tightly into a parcel this
locks in all the juices and flavor
then simply bake in a medium oven
unwrapped and here your guests ooh and
are with delight prepared in ten minutes
rat for intense flavor a stunning sea
bass that's bound to create a stir
look at your line where the string was
and look this one is gonna be amazing
next thinly sliced fresh fennel and
scatter over the toasted flatbread
then toast aromatic fennel seeds in a
hot dry pan
